“Together, let’s innovate for a
Zero Carbon, Zero Exclusion, Zero Poverty world”

Until March, 31st!

[/et_pb_slide] [/et_pb_fullwidth_slider][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section admin_label=”section”][et_pb_row admin_label=”row”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”left” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

Since 2008, the Convergences World Forum has provided a unique space where public, private and solidarity actors, as well as academics and media, can meet and debate to build together a “Zero exclusion, Zero carbon, Zero poverty” world.

The 10th Convergences World Forum will take place on September 4th and 5th, 2017! The 2017 subject will be “Together, let’s innovate for a Zero exclusion, Zero carbon, Zero poverty world”. About 30 sessions will be organised around the following Sustainable Development Goals (SGDs):

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Ligne”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″][et_pb_image admin_label=”Image” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”] [/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Ligne”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”left” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid” text_font_size=”20″]

JOIN THE VILLAGE 3ZERO/SDG!

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”left” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

Through these sessions, the Forum will aim to demonstrate the strength of a multi-actor approach. The sessions will have with a diversity of speakers from the public, private and solidarity sectors, coming from developed and developing countries, with a balanced representation of women and men.
They will value concrete solutions in order to achieve the SDGs and to build a 3Zero world. As far as possible, “Tech for Good” solutions will be presented.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”left” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

This year, the nave of the Palais Brongniart is turning into the 3Zero/Sustainable development goals (SDG) Village!

It will offer 4 distinct spaces, which will reflect the 8 selected SDG, as follows:

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image admin_label=”Image” src=”https://www.convergences.org/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/quartiers-salon-pro-EN.jpg” show_in_lightbox=”off” url_new_window=”off” use_overlay=”off” animation=”off” sticky=”off” align=”center” force_fullwidth=”off” always_center_on_mobile=”on” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”] [/et_pb_image][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”left” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

Join us and benefit from a high-quality visibility amongst 5,000 qualified attendees, and take part in this unique gathering reflecting on a fairer, more sustainable and inclusive world !

You can send your proposals to camille.jalinot@convergences.org until June 05th, 2017.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section admin_label=”Section” fullwidth=”off” specialty=”off”][et_pb_row admin_label=”Ligne”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″][et_pb_button use_bg_overlay=”off” use_text_overlay=”off” alignment=”center” background_layout=”dark” allow_player_pause=”off” text_border_radius=”3″ header_font_select=”default” header_font=”||||” body_font_size=”14″ body_font_size_tablet=”12″ body_font_size_phone=”12″ header_font_size=”18″ header_font_size_tablet=”18″ header_font_size_phone=”18″]

This call for proposals will be the perfect occasion to co-organise a conference, workshop or any other dynamic session!

The Guidelines of the Call for proposals can be found here, please take the time to read them carefully before sending in your application.

 

***
Please complete the corresponding form and send it back to carolina.herrera@convergences.org before March 31st, 2017.

[/et_pb_slide] [/et_pb_fullwidth_slider][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section admin_label=”Section” fullwidth=”off” specialty=”off”][et_pb_row admin_label=”Ligne”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”left” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

Calendar of upcoming deadlines |Co-organised sessions

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_tabs admin_label=”Onglets” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid” active_tab_background_color=”#d90871″] [et_pb_tab title=”March, 31st” tab_font_select=”default” tab_font=”||||” tab_line_height=”2em” tab_line_height_tablet=”2em” tab_line_height_phone=”2em” body_font_select=”default” body_font=”||||” body_line_height=”2em” body_line_height_tablet=”2em” body_line_height_phone=”2em”]

Deadline to submit proposals for the sessions

 

[/et_pb_tab][et_pb_tab title=”April, 25th” tab_font_select=”default” tab_font=”||||” tab_line_height=”2em” tab_line_height_tablet=”2em” tab_line_height_phone=”2em” body_font_select=”default” body_font=”||||” body_line_height=”2em” body_line_height_tablet=”2em” body_line_height_phone=”2em”]

  • Convergences’ provides feedback and modifications on the received contributions
  • Definition of the session topic and sending out invitations to speakers

[/et_pb_tab][et_pb_tab title=”May” tab_font_select=”default” tab_font=”||||” tab_line_height=”2em” tab_line_height_tablet=”2em” tab_line_height_phone=”2em” body_font_select=”default” body_font=”||||” body_line_height=”2em” body_line_height_tablet=”2em” body_line_height_phone=”2em”]

  • Follow-up of the session organisation (invitations, speakers’ biographies and photos)
  • Launch of the communication campaign (newsletter, social networks, posters, website, banners)

[/et_pb_tab][et_pb_tab title=”June – July” tab_font_select=”default” tab_font=”||||” tab_line_height=”2em” tab_line_height_tablet=”2em” tab_line_height_phone=”2em” body_font_select=”default” body_font=”||||” body_line_height=”2em” body_line_height_tablet=”2em” body_line_height_phone=”2em”]

5th of June : deadline to submit proposals for the Village 3Zero/SDG

  • New communication campaign
  • Brief for moderators and speakers
  • Finalisation of the session organisation (hotel, flights and visas management for speakers)

[/et_pb_tab] [/et_pb_tabs][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
